title: "US Defense Department Pours $800,000 Into Research Preventing Cyberattacks on Self-Driving Cars, UAVs Networks"
excerpt: "The University of Texas at Arlington receives an $800,000 grant from the US Department of Defense for research on developing defenses against potential cyberattacks on self-driving cars and unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) networks."
